description: Explore the city of love with visits to the Eiffel Tower, Louvre Museum, and more.
review: A romantic experience with beautiful sights and delicious food.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival in Paris, check-in at hotel, and evening at leisure.
tourPlan.day2: Full day city tour including Eiffel Tower and Seine River cruise.
tourPlan.day3: Day trip to Versailles Palace and gardens.
tourPlan.day4: Free day to explore local markets or optional Montmartre tour.

description: Experience the vibrant culture of Tokyo with visits to Shibuya Crossing, Tokyo Tower, and traditional temples.
review: An incredible blend of modern and traditional, with amazing food.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival in Kyoto, transfer to hotel and welcome dinner.
tourPlan.day2: Visit Kinkaku-ji, Nijo Castle, and Arashiyama Bamboo Grove.
tourPlan.day3: Tea ceremony experience and Fushimi Inari Shrine visit.
tourPlan.day4: Morning free for shopping and departure in the afternoon.

description: Discover the Big Apple with tours of Times Square, Central Park, and the Statue of Liberty.
review: The city that never sleeps, full of energy and iconic landmarks.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and city tour, including Table Mountain cableway.
tourPlan.day4: Safari tour at a nearby game reserve.
tourPlan.day5: Winelands tour and tasting in Stellenbosch.

description: Enjoy the stunning beaches and landmarks like the Sydney Opera House and Harbour Bridge.
review: A beautiful city with amazing beaches and great outdoor activities.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival in Sydney and transfer to hotel.
tourPlan.day2: Opera House tour and Harbour Bridge walk.
tourPlan.day3: Bondi Beach day trip and surfing lessons.
tourPlan.day6: Free day for shopping or personal activities.

description: Immerse yourself in history with visits to the Colosseum, Vatican City, and ancient ruins.
review: A historical paradise with incredible architecture and delicious cuisine.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival in Dubai, check-in, and evening Dhow Cruise.
tourPlan.day2: Full-day city tour and visit Burj Khalifa.
tourPlan.day3: Desert safari experience and return to hotel for departure.

description: Explore the wonders of ancient Egypt with tours of the Pyramids of Giza and the Sphinx.
review: A journey through ancient history, with awe-inspiring monuments.

tourPlan.day1: Flight to Auckland, transfer to Queenstown.
tourPlan.day7: Rotorua hot springs and Maori cultural experience.
tourPlan.day9: Beach day at Piha and return to Auckland.

description: Experience the beauty of Cape Town with visits to Table Mountain, Robben Island, and local vineyards.
review: Stunning natural landscapes and a vibrant cultural scene.

tourPlan.day1: Ferry to Santorini, transfer to hotel, evening sunset in Oia.
tourPlan.day2: Caldera cruise and hot springs swim.
tourPlan.day4: Island tour, including Akrotiri and Pyrgos.
tourPlan.day5: Leisure morning and return ferry to Athens.

description: Discover the bustling city life and beautiful temples in Bangkok, including the Grand Palace.
review: A lively city with amazing street food and rich cultural heritage.

tourPlan.day1: Arrival and transfer to riad, evening market tour.
tourPlan.day2: Full day historical city tour including Bahia Palace.

description: Enjoy the vibrant culture and stunning beaches of Rio, with visits to Christ the Redeemer and Sugarloaf Mountain.

tourPlan.day2: Golden Circle tour including Geysir and Gullfoss.
tourPlan.day3: South Coast tour with glacier hike.

description: Explore the unique architecture and lively streets of Barcelona, including Sagrada Familia and Park Güell.
